content: super bulky yarn ideal for plush toys in a tan or other light color round 1 create a magic_ring and work 12 single_crochet into the ring 12 round 2 2sc in first st single_crochet in next st *2sc in next st single_crochet in next st* repeat * * around 18 round 3 2sc in first st single_crochet in next 2 sts *2sc in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat * * around 24 pattern continued round 4 2sc in first st single_crochet in next 3 sts *2sc in next st single_crochet in next 3 sts* repeat * * around 30 round 5 2sc in first st single_crochet in next 4 sts *2sc in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts* repeat * * around 36 rounds 6 - 7 single_crochet into each st around 36 slip_stitch to first st to join round 8 single_crochet in first st double_crochet in next st *single_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st* repeat * * around 36 slip_stitch to join fo and weave in ends gently push the dcs so they puff outward betsy should fit perfectly into her cozy little nest
